JOB DESCRIPTION: Developers, ready for your next career move?           Multiple opportunities (Associate through to Manager level)           Be part of our global growth and transformation           Newly created roles Java, Mean Stack and Big Data           Work as part of a valued and collaborative team           Have working knowledge or experience in:             Java      (JAVA/J2EE, WebServices, Spring, Hibernate, Play/ Scala, microservices architecture, Kafka, Kubernetes, OIDC, Oracle, PostgreSQL)            Mean Stack      (Angular     , NodeJS, Typescript, Mongo, ExpressJS, WebSerivces,      microservices architecture,      Kafka, Kubernetes, OIDC)            Big Data      (HDFS, Kafka, Spark, Mongo, PostgreSQL, microservices architecture, Kubernetes)           Understand: experience working across some (or all):            Telecom BSS Domain knowledge            Cloud Technologies           Large     scale integration projects and performance           Business Process Modelling           Be recognised for the following attributes:           Delivers High Quality Work            Business Acumen            Effective Communicator (internally and externally)           Critical Thinking and Problem Solving           Resilient and able to easily adapt to change            Collaborative with colleagues and peers at all levels            You will contribute by:           Participating in all aspects of the Hansen product development life cycle.           Write quality, well-engineered, unit tested, maintainable and readable code, engineered according to business development and architectural standards           Follow standard design patterns and preferably a test-driven approach to development.           Work collaboratively and engage with Product Management to produce technical and functional specification documentation appropriate to technical developer and non-technical business audiences.
